name: The Street Food of Hanoian
description:
As you may know, Hanoi is well-known for being one of the Asia's 10 greatest street food cities. This tour will take you around Hanoi, visit its sightseeing, and furthermore, give you the chance to enjoy the street food of it in many ways, from a street vendor, to an elegant restaurant, from morning breakfast, to late night supper. You will not only have chance to taste them all, but also have the chance to enjoy the diversity of Hanoi culture, from a peaceful morning, till crazy parties at midnight and so on.
And what is the most special thing? You can join the tour at every moment of the day you want. You may be in the night before leaving Hanoi, and want something special ? Or you have just arrive, feel tire and want to relax? You have an evening break from the morning conference and want to try new things that you have never before? Just call us.
